alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 29 at 12:26AM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Hillsborough River At Morris Bridge affecting Hillsborough County. For the Hillsborough...including Morris Bridge, Temple Terrace, Hillsborough River State Park...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hillsborough River At Morris Bridge. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 35.0 feet, Portions of Morris Bridge road about 3/4 of a mile south of the bridge begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 28.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight and continue rising to 33.2 feet on Monday. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 32.0 feet. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (2 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue Hillsborough River Morris Bridge 32.0 28.0 Wed 3 pm 30.2 32.1 33.0 33.2 MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued as warranted.
